amendment.description: Amendment suspends further implementation of the National Reporting System while the National Academy of Sciences conducts a review and provides guidance on appropriate measurements, standards and assessments to be used with children.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 109-229 to suspend further implementation of the National Reporting System while the National Academy of Sciences (NAS) conducts a review and provides guidance on appropriate child outcomes and assessments for young children, as authorized in H.R. 2123.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kind amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
